name: Emma K.
title: Birthday Girl
headline: Got Compliments All Night Long
text: I wore this to my 23rd birthday dinner and literally every person asked where I got it. The rhinestones catch the light PERFECTLY and the fit is so flattering. I felt like the main character üíé

name: Mia R.
title: Club Regular
headline: From Invisible to Unforgettable
text: no bc this dress is everything??? wore it out Saturday and literally had 5 people come up asking about it. the navy blue with gold rhinestones hits different under club lights. bodycon but not too tight you know? i actually felt confident for once ‚ú®

name: Zara M.
title: NYE Party Queen
headline: Best Purchase I've Made This Year
text: bought this for NYE and it was PERFECT. the rhinestones are actually good quality not that cheap plastic stuff. danced all night and it stayed in place, didn't ride up at all. got so many compliments i lost count üòç already planning what event to wear it to next

name: Aaliyah J.
title: Date Night Diva
headline: He Couldn't Stop Staring
text: wore this on a first date and the way his jaw DROPPED when I walked up üíÄ the square neckline is so flattering and the slit is sexy but not too much. felt like that girl for real. 100% wearing this again

name: Ava S.
title: Influencer
headline: My Followers Went Crazy For This
text: posted pics in this dress and got 300+ likes in an hour which literally never happens üî• the navy blue photographs SO well, way better than black. rhinestones sparkle without looking costume-y. fits true to size, i'm 5'6 and got a small. chef's kiss honestly

name: Layla C.
title: Mom's Night Out
headline: Still Got It And This Dress Proved It
text: first girls night in MONTHS and i needed something that would make me feel like myself again. this dress did exactly that. got compliments from strangers, felt confident dancing, and my friends were like 'ok we see you!' the fit is forgiving but still looks amazing üíô

name: Chloe T.
title: Vegas Baby
headline: Perfect For My Vegas Trip
text: took this to vegas for my bestie's bachelorette and it was THE dress. wore it to dinner then straight to the club and it looked perfect for both. the gold rhinestones are so pretty and the dress doesn't wrinkle which is clutch when you're traveling ‚úàÔ∏è

name: Sophia W.
title: Bachelorette Babe
headline: Outshined The Bride (Oops)
text: wore this to my friend's bachelorette and even SHE said i looked stunning üò≠ the bodycon fit hugs in all the right places and the navy blue is so unique. literally planning my whole spring around events i can wear this to. obsessed doesn't even cover it

name: Isabella H.
title: Confident Queen
headline: Finally Found MY Dress
text: i've ordered like 6 dresses from different sites and they all looked cheap or didn't fit right. THIS ONE is different. the rhinestones actually sparkle, the fabric has stretch so it's comfy, and i didn't feel self-conscious AT ALL wearing it. that's huge for me. worth every penny üéâ
